japanese:
よお、三玖にらいは。
ここで休んでたのか。
translation:
Hey, Miku and Raiha.
Were you resting here?

japanese:
あっ、お兄ちゃん。
お兄ちゃんも休憩しにきたの？
translation:
Ah, big bro.
Did you come here to take a break too?

japanese:
休憩というか、
お前らの姿が見えたから来てみたんだが。
translation: Not really for a break, I just came to see you guys.

japanese: じゃあ、フータローも一緒に休もう。
translation: Well, shall we take a break together, Futaro?

japanese: まあ、そうするか。
translation: Sure, why not?

japanese:
らいはちゃん、四葉と泳いで疲れてない？
大丈夫？
translation:
Raiha-chan, did you get tired
from swimming with Yotsuba?
Are you okay?

japanese:
私は大丈夫だけど、
一緒に泳いでた五月さんが
かなり疲れちゃってたみたい。
translation:
I'm fine, but Itsuki-san swam with us too and got
totally annihilated.

japanese:
ああ、大分へばってたな。
二乃が面倒見てたから大丈夫だとは思うが。
translation:
Oh, she was quite exhausted.
But Nino took care of her,
so I think she's okay.

japanese:
四葉さん、息切れせずに
泳いでてビックリしちゃった！
translation:
I was surprised that Yotsuba-san swam
without getting out of breath!

japanese:
運動が得意だって聞いてたけど、
もうアスリートみたいだね。
translation:
I heard she's good at sports,
but now she is as fast as an athlete.

japanese:
四葉、いろんな部活に参加して記録を残してたから。
ある意味、アスリート級なのかも。
translation:
Yotsuba joined various sports clubs and set records.
In a way, she's already an athlete.

japanese: ああ、確かに。
translation: Yeah, that's right.

japanese:
自分から休憩が欲しいと言い出したし、
どこかでゆっくり休んでるんだろう。
translation:
She said that she wanted a break herself,
so maybe she's resting somewhere.

japanese:
四葉さん、息切れせずに
泳いでてビックリしちゃった！
translation:
I was surprised that Yotsuba-san swam
without getting out of breath!

japanese:
運動が得意だって聞いてたけど、
もうアスリートみたいだね。
translation:
I heard she's good at sports,
but she's like an athlete now.

japanese:
四葉、いろんな部活に参加して記録を残してたから。
ある意味、アスリート級なのかも。
translation:
Yotsuba has participated in various sports clubs
and set records.
In a way, she's already like an athlete.

japanese:
その結果で、体育大学への推薦まで
もぎ取ったんだからな。
大したもんだ。
translation:
As a result, she even got recommended
to a sports academy. That's amazing.

japanese:
すごいな～。
四葉さん、将来はなにかのプロ選手に
なっちゃうかもしれないね。
translation:
Wowww.
Yotsuba-san might become a professional athlete
in the future.

japanese:
四葉がプロ選手……。
想像したことなかった。
translation:
Yotsuba, as a pro athlete...
I'd never imagined that.

japanese:
あり得なくもなさそうなのが
四葉の恐ろしいところだなぁ。
translation:
The scary thing about Yotsuba is that even becoming an 
athlete is not impossible.

japanese:
水泳選手でもいけそうだよ？
あれだけ泳げてたんだもん。
translation:
She could even be a competitive swimmer!
To be able to swim THAT well is mind boggling.

japanese:
確かに。
しかし、この時期に
普通に海に入れるのも驚きだ。
translation:
Indeed. However, it's surprising
that we are allowed to swim in the ocean 
at this time of the year.

japanese:
本州じゃ、まだ寒くて泳ぐどころじゃないし。
同じ国なのにここまで気温が違うんだ。
translation:
In Honshu, it's still too cold to swim.
It's amazing how the temperature can differ so much even in 
the same country.

japanese:
いまの季節でこの気温なら、
真夏だと暑くて干からびちゃいそう。
translation:
If the temperature is this high at this time of year, 
it would be too hot and dry in mid-summer.

japanese:
そういや、沖縄だと真夏は
下手すると日焼けどころか火傷になるって
どっかで読んだな。
translation:
Come to think of it. I read that somewhere in Okinawa,
in the height of summer, you can actually get burned
by the sun.

japanese: ええっ、それじゃ外を歩けないよ？
translation: What? Then you can't even walk outside, right?

japanese: ああ、だから日焼け止めや日傘が必須だとか。
translation: Yeah, that's why sunscreen and parasols are essential.

japanese:
本当に環境が違うんだ。
過ごしやすいこの時期に来たのは正解かも。
translation:
The environment is really different.
It was a good decision to come to Okinawa
during this time of the year.

japanese:
沖縄は亜熱帯だしな。
一部は熱帯に属しているところもある。
translation:
Okinawa IS a subtropical region, 
but some parts have a tropical climate.

japanese: ちなみに、本州はほぼ温暖湿潤気候だ。
translation: By the way, Honshu has a mostly warm humid climate.

japanese: それ、授業で聞いた。
translation: I learned that in class.

japanese:
そうだ、授業で学んだことが日常生活で役立つ！
素晴らしいじゃないか！
translation:
Wow, what we learn in class
can be useful in our daily lives!
Amazing, eh?!

japanese:
もう……。
お兄ちゃんはすぐ勉強に繋げるんだから。
translation:
Come on...
You always manage to connect everything and anything
back to studying, don't you, big bro?

japanese:
とりあえず、日焼け止めはちゃんとしよう。
らいはちゃんも、海で泳いでたから
塗り直したほうがいいよ。
translation:
Anyway, let's make sure to apply sunscreen properly.
Raiha-chan, you also swam in the ocean,
so it's better to reapply it.

japanese: はーい。
translation: Okay.

japanese: フータローもちゃんとしてね。
translation: Futaro, make sure you do it properly too.

japanese: おう、面倒だがそういう自衛は必要だからな。
translation:
Yeah, it's a hassle,
but it's necessary to protect ourselves.

japanese:
人も少なくていいよな。
こうして、のんびり海を楽しめる。
translation:
It's nice that there are fewer people around.
We can enjoy the beach at our own leisure.

japanese:
確かに、そうだね。
観光地だからもっと人が多いかと思ってた。
translation:
Indeed. I thought there would be more people
since this is a tourist spot.

japanese:
人が多すぎて泳げないなんてことはないし、
のんびり浮き輪で浮かんでられるし……。
translation:
There aren't so many people that we're unable to swim,
and we can relax on our floats...

japanese:
そう考えると、
いまの時期にここへ来たのはやっぱり正解。
translation:
Thinking about it, coming here at this time of the year
was definitely the right choice.

japanese:
つまり俺の提案は
まさに完璧だったということだな！
translation: So, my proposal was perfect, wasn't it?!

japanese: ふふ、そうだね。
translation: Teehee, it was.

japanese:
とりあえず、日焼け止めはちゃんとしよう。
らいはちゃんも、海で泳いでたから
塗り直したほうがいいよ。
translation:
Anyway, let's make sure to apply sunscreen properly.
Raiha-chan, you also swam in the ocean,
so it's better to reapply it.

japanese: はーい。
translation: Okay.

japanese: フータローもちゃんとしてね。
translation: Futaro, make sure you do it properly too.

japanese: おう、面倒だがそういう自衛は必要だからな。
translation:
Yeah, it's a hassle,
but it's necessary to protect ourselves.

japanese:
真夏も体験してみたいな。
話が大袈裟なのか本当なのか、どっちだろう。
translation:
It'd be great in midsummer too.
I wonder if the stories are exaggerated,
or if it's really that hot.

japanese:
ええ？
お兄ちゃん、火傷したいの？
translation:
Huh?
Do you wanna get sunburned, big bro?

japanese:
わざわざ火傷したいわけじゃない。
火傷するほどの暑さが本当なのか、
実際に体験してみたいだけだ。
translation:
It's not like I want to get sunburned.
I just want to know if it gets as hot as they say,
and experience it for myself.

japanese:
実際に体験するのと聞くだけじゃ、
かなり違うからな。
translation:
Experiencing it for yourself
is different from just hearing about it, ya know.

japanese: フータロー、変わったよね。
translation: Futaro, you've changed.

japanese: は？　なにがだ？
translation: Huh? How so?

japanese: 前の、頭でっかちだった頃とは考え方が変わってる。
translation:
You used to be so full of yourself,
but your way of thinking has changed.

japanese:
私たちが変わったように、
フータローも変わったんだ。
translation: We all have changed.

japanese: そりゃあな……色々あったし。
translation: Well... A lot of things happened.

japanese: でも、まだまだ頭でっかちなところ、あると思うなー。
translation: But, I still think that you are too headstrong, big bro.

japanese: そうだね、まだまだかも。
translation: Yes, you still need to work on that, perhaps.

japanese:
とりあえず、日焼け止めはちゃんとしよう。
らいはちゃんも、海で泳いでたから
塗り直したほうがいいよ。
translation:
Anyway, let's make sure to apply sunscreen properly.
Raiha-chan, you also swam in the ocean,
so it's better to reapply it.

japanese: はーい。
translation: Okay.

japanese: フータローもちゃんとしてね。
translation: Futaro, make sure you do it properly too.

japanese: おう、面倒だがそういう自衛は必要だからな。
translation:
Yeah, it's a hassle,
but it's necessary to protect ourselves.

japanese:
冬に来れば、さすがに
日焼け止めは必要ないのかな？
translation: During winter, you don't need sunscreen, right?

japanese:
まあ、大丈夫なんじゃないか？
確かなことは言えないが。
translation: Well, I'm not sure, but I think it'll be okay.

japanese:
……沖縄と言えば海だけど、
あえて冬に来て、海以外の観光地を
巡るのもいいかもしれない。
translation:
...For me Okinawa is all about the ocean,
but it might be nice to come back in winter
and explore other tourist spots besides the ocean.

japanese:
冬限定のグルメとかか？
五月が食いつきそうだな。
translation:
Yeah, maybe getting some winter-exclusive gourmet food?
Itsuki would definitely be interested in that.

japanese:
それも含めて、他のこと。
時期をずらすのも観光の楽しみ方かなって。
translation:
I thought that visiting at a different time of the year might 
be a another way to enjoy sightseeing in Okinawa.

japanese:
また沖縄に来ることがあったら、
そういう風に楽しんでも良さそう。
translation:
If there's another chance to come to Okinawa,
it would be nice to enjoy it in winter.

japanese: 次の機会か……。
translation: Next time, eh...

japanese: もし計画を立てたら、フータローは来てくれる？
translation: If we make a plan, will you come too, Futaro?

japanese: 姉妹水入らずの邪魔じゃないならいいぞ。
translation: If I don't bother you quintuplets too much.

japanese:
邪魔なわけないよ。
それと、ちゃんと二乃との時間も用意する。
そこは安心して。
translation:
It's not a bother at all.
And also, we'll make sure you can spend time with Nino
as well. You can rest assured about that.

japanese: 安心って……。
translation: Rest assured, huh...

japanese:
らいはちゃんも招待するからね。
フータローと一緒に来て。
translation:
Raiha-chan, you're also invited, just
come along with Futaro.

japanese: えへへ、ありがとうございます！
translation: Teehee, thank you very much!
